hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash # copied/modified from /usr/share/doc/pbuilder/examples/rebuild/buildall
DIST=sid MIRROR=ftp://ftp.uk.debian.org
BUILDDIR=$WORKSPACE BASEPATH="/srv/sid-base.cow" Sources=/srv/jenkins-slave/workspace/JOB-prepare-binaries-chroots/label/$NODE_NAME/JOB-Debian-sid/workspace/Sources
function print_bugreport_template { local pkg="$1" local ver="$2"
cat <<EOF To: submit@bugs.debian.org Subject: $pkg:
Package: $pkg Version: $ver Usertags: goto-cc
During a rebuild of all Debian packages in a clean sid chroot (using cowbuilder and pbuilder) the build failed with the following error. Please note that we use our research compiler tool-chain (using tools from the cbmc package), which permits extended reporting on type inconsistencies at link time.
http://sources.debian.net/src/$pkg/$ver/ http://packages.qa.debian.org/$pkg EOF
}
function build { PACKAGE=$1
rm -rf $BUILDDIR/* $BUILDDIR/.[a-zA-Z]*
G=$(grep-dctrl -S -n -s Directory,Version -r ^$PACKAGE$ $Sources | tail -n 3) set -- $G DIR=$1 export FULLVER=$2 VER=`echo $FULLVER | sed s/^.*://` umask 0022; export DEB_VENDOR=Debian; dget -u -x ${MIRROR}/debian/${DIR}/${PACKAGE}_${VER}.dsc cd $(find . -type d ! -name .) retval=0 if [ -d /import/debian-mole/debian-builds/patch-candidates/$PACKAGE ] ; then for p in /import/debian-mole/debian-builds/patch-candidates/$PACKAGE/* ; do if patch -p1 --dry-run < $p ; then patch -p1 < $p else retval=1 break fi done fi if [ $retval -eq 0 ] ; then mkdir -p $BUILDDIR/result export -n DISPLAY PKG HUDSON_URL; pdebuild --pbuilder cowbuilder --use-pdebuild-internal --buildresult $BUILDDIR/result/ -- --basepath $BASEPATH retval=$? fi
#sloccount --duplicates --wide --details . > $BUILDDIR/../JOB-Debian-sloccount/$PACKAGE-sloccount.sc
if [ $retval -eq 0 ] ; then cp debian/copyright $BUILDDIR/goto-binaries/ cd $BUILDDIR echo "Package: $PACKAGE" > goto-binaries/control echo "Version: $FULLVER" >> goto-binaries/control echo "Goto-CC-Date: `date -r $BASEPATH/usr/bin/goto-cc`" >> goto-binaries/control echo "Goto-CC-MD5Sum: `md5sum $BASEPATH/usr/bin/goto-cc | awk '{ print $1 }'`" >> goto-binaries/control rm -rf $PACKAGE-* result *.deb if [ -d goto-binaries ] ; then tar cjf goto-binaries.tar.bz2 goto-binaries ; rm -rf goto-binaries ; fi else print_bugreport_template "$PACKAGE" "$FULLVER" fi
return $retval }
build $PKG
